dict.acceptation: 损害，毁坏；伤害（名誉、自尊等）；（尤指事故中）伤害；伤害（感情，自尊心等）；

sent.orig: Inhaled irritants can injure the tracheal lining and increase the chance of infection (Bacterial or viral).
sent.trans: 吸入的刺激物能损害气管黏膜，增加感染（细菌的或滤过性毒菌的）的机会。

sent.orig: Too much smoking tends to injure the voice.
Due to heavy computer use, wrist tendons can injure the median nerve responsible for finger function.
sent.trans: 由于频繁地使用电脑，手腕肌腱伤害了负责手指活动的正中神经。

sent.orig: You will only injure yourself if take notice of despicable enemies.
sent.trans: 如果去在意卑劣的敌人，反而会身受其害。

sent.orig: Have quack and such-and-such baby of constant accidentally injure, but he unluckily domestic Ding Xingwang.
sent.trans: 有个庸医某某常误伤婴儿，可他偏偏家丁兴旺。
